text:
="preserve">Ian Morton Armstrong (17 July 1937 – 16 December 2020) was an Australian politician. He was the Deputy Premier of New South Wales from 1993 to 1995. He was a member of the Parliament of New South Wales from 1981 to 2007. Armstrong was a member of the National Party.
Armstrong died on 16 December 2020 at the age of 83.
